title: Event Logistics Assistant
description: Assist in setting up and dismantling event infrastructure, provide directions to attendees, and support overall event logistics
requirements: Willingness to work in outdoor environments and on weekends, ability to lift and move equipment
location: Various event venues within the community

title: Habitat Restoration Volunteer
description: Participate in planting trees, removing invasive species, and restoring natural habitats to support environmental conservation efforts
requirements: Ability to work in various weather conditions, comfortable with physical labor
location: Natural areas such as parks, forests, or riverbanks
